content: Head past the ranged attacker above (note the Aged Ginseng on the left is actually a Ginsengling), and go through a doorway to spy a large cave entrance up ahead. Stick to the right to find a sloping path back, and a new stony enemy variant will burrow out of the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The First Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Head past the ranged attacker above (note the Aged Ginseng on the left is actually a Ginsengling), and go through a doorway to spy a large cave entrance up ahead. Stick to the right to find a sloping path back, and a new stony enemy variant will burrow out of the ground.
